summary: As the story opens, a busful of tourists are touring Copenhagen. Their guide draws their attention to the beautiful statue at Langelinie. At that, the film's focus moves below the waterline, where several fish tell the story of ...
cast: Viktoriya Novikova|Valentin Nikulin|Galina Artyomova|Yuri Senkevich|Stefan Iliev|Svetlana Mojseyenko|Margarita Chudinova|Galina Volchek|Mikhail Pugovkin|Stefan Pejchev|Mikhail Yanushkevich|Andrey Fayt|Yuliy Fayt|Krasimira Petrova|Ivan Manov|Ivan Gaydardzhiev
title: La sirenita
